General.Name: High Sierra Technologies Inc
General.Description: High Sierra Technologies, Inc. focuses on the development of patents and other products used in the processing of recreational cannabis and industrial hemp. Its patent portfolio includes low odor cannabis and hemp for smoking or as the starting materials for producing low odor cannabis and hemp products or flavored cannabis and hemp products. High Sierra Technologies, Inc. is based in Reno, Nevada.
General.Address: 1495 Ridgeview Drive, Reno, NV, United States, 89519

1.Name: Mr. Gregg William Koechlein Esq.
1.Title: COO, CFO, Treasurer, Gen. Counsel, Sec. & Director
